trans-unit.source: Walkthrough: Displaying Data in a DataRepeater Control (Visual Studio) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 逐步解說︰ 在 DataRepeater 控制項 (Visual Studio) 中顯示資料 |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: Walkthrough: Displaying Data in a DataRepeater Control (Visual Studio)
trans-unit.target: 逐步解說：在 DataRepeater 控制項中顯示資料 (Visual Studio)

trans-unit.source: This walkthrough provides a basic start-to-finish scenario for displaying bound data in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 本逐步解說顯示繫結中的資料提供基本的開始-完成案例<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Prerequisite
trans-unit.target: 必要條件

trans-unit.source: This walkthrough requires the Northwind sample database.
trans-unit.target: 這個逐步解說需要使用 Northwind 範例資料庫。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have this database on your development computer, you can download it from the [Microsoft Download Center](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98088).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的開發電腦上沒有這個資料庫，則可以從 [Microsoft 下載中心](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98088)下載。

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see [Downloading Sample Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb399411).
trans-unit.target: 如需指示，請參閱[下載範例資料庫](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb399411)。

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概觀

trans-unit.source: The first part of this walkthrough consists of four main tasks:
trans-unit.target: 本逐步解說的第一個部分包含四項主要工作：

trans-unit.source: Creating a solution.
trans-unit.target: 建立方案。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Adding a data source.
trans-unit.target: 加入資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Adding data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 加入資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creating a DataRepeater Solution
trans-unit.target: 建立 DataRepeater 方案

trans-unit.source: In the first step, you create a project and solution.
trans-unit.target: 在第一個步驟中，您會建立專案和方案。

trans-unit.source: To create a DataRepeater solution
trans-unit.target: 建立 DataRepeater 方案

trans-unit.source: On the Visual Studio **File** menu, click **New Project**.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 的 [檔案] 功能表上，按一下 [新增專案] 。

trans-unit.source: In the **Project types** pane in the **New Project** dialog box, expand **Visual Basic**, and then click **Windows**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [ **新增專案** ] 對話方塊的 [ **專案類型** ] 窗格中，展開 [ **Visual Basic**]，然後按一下 [ **Windows**]。

trans-unit.source: In the **Templates** pane, click **Windows Forms Application**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [範本] 窗格中，按一下 [Windows Form 應用程式] 。

trans-unit.source: In the **Name** box, type `DataRepeaterApp`.
trans-unit.target: 在 [名稱] 方塊中，輸入 `DataRepeaterApp`。

trans-unit.source: Click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [ **確定**]。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms Designer opens.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms 設計工具隨即開啟。

trans-unit.source: Select the form in the Windows Forms Designer.
trans-unit.target: 從 [Windows Form 設計工具] 中選取表單。

trans-unit.source: In the **Properties** window, set the **Size** property to `800, 700`.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 **Size** 屬性設定為 `800, 700`。

trans-unit.source: Adding a DataRepeater Control
trans-unit.target: 加入 DataRepeater 控制項

trans-unit.source: In this step, you add a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control to the form.
trans-unit.target: 在此步驟中，您將加入<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項加入表單。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: To add a DataRepeater control
trans-unit.target: 加入 DataRepeater 控制項

trans-unit.source: On the **View** menu, click **Toolbox**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [ **檢視** ] 功能表上，按一下 [ **工具箱**]。

trans-unit.source: The **Toolbox** opens.
trans-unit.target: [ **工具箱** ] 會開啟。

trans-unit.source: Select the **Visual Basic PowerPacks** tab.
trans-unit.target: 選取 [Visual Basic PowerPacks] 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: Drag a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control onto **Form1**.
trans-unit.target: 拖放到<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項拖曳至**Form1**。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, set the **Location** property to `0, 25`.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 **Location** 屬性設定為 `0, 25`。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Size** property to `460, 600`.
trans-unit.target: 將 **Size** 屬性設定為 `460, 600`。

trans-unit.source: Adding a Data Source
trans-unit.target: 加入資料來源

trans-unit.source: In this step, you add a data source for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此步驟中，您加入的資料來源<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: To add a data source
trans-unit.target: 加入資料來源

trans-unit.source: On the **Data** menu, click **Show Data Sources**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [ **資料** ] 功能表上的 [ **顯示資料來源**]。

trans-unit.source: In the **Data Sources** window, click **Add New Data Source**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [ **資料來源** ] 視窗中，按一下 [ **加入新資料來源**]。

trans-unit.source: Select **Database** on the **Choose a Data Source Type** page, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: 請選取 [ **選擇資料來源類型** ] 頁面上的 [ **資料庫** ]，再按 [ **下一步**]。

trans-unit.source: On the **Choose Your Data Connection** page, perform one of the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 在 [ **選擇資料連接** ] 頁面上，執行下列其中一個步驟：

trans-unit.source: If a data connection to the Northwind sample database is available in the drop-down list, click it.
trans-unit.target: 如果下拉式清單中提供 Northwind 範例資料庫的資料連接，請按一下這個資料連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Click **New Connection** to configure a new data connection.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [新增連接] ，設定新的資料連接。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create Connections to SQL Server Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/360c340d-e5a6-4a7e-a569-e95d500be43d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 建立連接至 SQL Server 資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/360c340d-e5a6-4a7e-a569-e95d500be43d)。

trans-unit.source: If the database requires a password, select the option to include sensitive data, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料庫需要密碼，請選取選項來加入敏感性資料，然後按 [下一步] 。

trans-unit.source: If a dialog box appears, click **Yes** to save the file to your project.
trans-unit.target: 如果對話方塊隨即出現，請按一下 [是] ，將檔案儲存到專案。

trans-unit.source: Click **Next** on the **Save Connection String to the Application Configuration file** page.
trans-unit.target: 在 [Save Connection String to the Application Configuration file] (將連接字串儲存到應用程式組態檔)頁面上，按一下 [下一步] 。

trans-unit.source: Expand the **Tables** node on the **Choose Your Database Objects** page.
trans-unit.target: 在 [選擇您的資料庫物件] 頁面上，展開 [資料表] 節點。

trans-unit.source: Select the check boxes next to the **Customers** and **Orders** tables, and then click **Finish**.
trans-unit.target: 選取 [Customers] 和 [Orders] 資料表旁邊的核取方塊，然後按一下 [完成] 。

trans-unit.source: **NorthwindDataSet** is added to your project and the **Customers** and **Orders** tables appear in the **Data Sources** window.
trans-unit.target: 會將 [] 加入專案中，且 [] 和 [] 資料表會出現在 [資料來源] 視窗中。

trans-unit.source: Adding Data-Bound Controls
trans-unit.target: 加入資料繫結控制項

trans-unit.source: In this step, you add data-bound controls to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在此步驟中，將資料繫結控制項來加入<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: To add data-bound controls
trans-unit.target: 若要加入資料繫結控制項

trans-unit.source: In the **Data Sources** window, select the top-level node for the **Customers** table.
trans-unit.target: 在 [資料來源] 視窗中，選取 [Customers] 資料表的最上層節點。

trans-unit.source: Change the drop type of the table to **Details** by clicking **Details** in the drop-down list on the table node.
trans-unit.target: 在資料表節點上，按一下下拉式清單中的 [詳細資料] ，將資料表的卸除類型變更為 **[詳細資料]** 。

trans-unit.source: Select the **Customers** table node and drag it onto the item template region (the upper region) of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 選取**客戶**資料表節點，並將其拖曳到項目樣板區域 （左上區域） 的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control is added to the form, and the **NorthwindDataSet**, **CustomersBindingSource**, **CustomersTableAdapter**, **TableAdapterManager**, and **CustomersBindingNavigator** components are added to the Component Tray.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>控制項加入至表單，而**NorthwindDataSet**， **CustomersBindingSource**， **CustomersTableAdapter**， **TableAdapterManager**，和**CustomersBindingNavigator**元件新增至元件匣。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Select all of the fields and their associated labels and position them near the left edge of the item template region.
trans-unit.target: 選取所有的欄位及其關聯的標籤，然後放置在靠近項目範本區域左邊緣的地方。

trans-unit.source: Select the last five fields (**Region**, **Postal Code**, **Country**, **Phone**, and **Fax**) and their associated labels and move them up and to the right of the first six fields.
trans-unit.target: 選取後五個欄位 ([Region]、[Postal Code] 、[Country] 、[Phone] 和 [Fax] ) 及其關聯的標籤，然後向上移至前六個欄位的右方。

trans-unit.source: Select the item template (the upper region of the control).
trans-unit.target: 選取項目範本 (控制項的上方區域)。

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, set the **Size** property to `427, 170`.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 **Size** 屬性設定為 `427, 170`。

trans-unit.source: At this point, you have a working application that will display a repeating list of customers.
trans-unit.target: 此時，您有一個將會顯示客戶重複清單的工作應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You can press F5 to run the application, change the data, and add or delete customer records.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按 F5 鍵執行應用程式、變更資料，以及加入或刪除客戶資料錄。

trans-unit.source: In the next optional steps, you will learn how to customize the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 在下一步的選擇性步驟中，您將學習如何自訂<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Next Steps (Optional)
trans-unit.target: 後續步驟 (選擇性)

trans-unit.source: This part of the walkthrough consists of four optional tasks:
trans-unit.target: 此逐步解說部分包含四項選擇性工作：

trans-unit.source: Changing the appearance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 變更外觀的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Preventing users from adding or deleting records.
trans-unit.target: 防止使用者加入或刪除資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Adding search capability to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 加入搜尋功能，可<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Adding a master and detail table to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 將主要和詳細的資料表來<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Changing the Appearance of the DataRepeater Control
trans-unit.target: 變更 DataRepeater 控制項的外觀

trans-unit.source: In this optional step, you change the `BackColor` of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個選擇性的步驟，在您變更`BackColor`的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項在設計階段。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: You also add code to display rows in alternating colors and to change a label's `ForeColor` conditionally.
trans-unit.target: 您也會加入程式碼，以替代色彩的方式顯示資料列，並根據條件變更標籤的 `ForeColor` 。

trans-unit.source: To change the appearance of the control
trans-unit.target: 變更控制項的外觀

trans-unit.source: In the Windows Forms Designer, select the main (lower) region of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 設計工具中，選取 主要 （下方） 區域<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, set the `BackColor` property to white.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 `BackColor` 屬性設定為白色。

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>開啟程式碼編輯器。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: In the Code Editor, in the Event drop-down list, click **DrawItem**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [程式碼編輯器] 中，按一下 [事件] 下拉式清單中的 [DrawItem] 。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater.DrawItem> event handler, add the following code to alternate the `BackColor`:
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater.DrawItem>事件處理常式，將下列程式碼加入至替代`BackColor`:</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#1](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_1.cs)] [!code-vb[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#1](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_1.cs) ] [!code-vb [VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater.DrawItem> event handler, add the following code to change the `ForeColor` of a label depending on a condition:
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater.DrawItem>事件處理常式，加入下列程式碼，變更`ForeColor`根據條件的標籤︰</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#2](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_2.cs)] [!code-vb[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#2](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_2.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_2.cs) ] [!code-vb [VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_2.vb)]

trans-unit.source: Press F5 to run the application and see the customizations.
trans-unit.target: 按 F5 鍵執行應用程式並查看自訂。

trans-unit.source: Preventing Users from Adding or Deleting Records
trans-unit.target: 防止使用者加入或刪除資料錄

trans-unit.source: In this optional step, you add code that prevents users from adding or deleting records in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 在這個選擇性的步驟，將加入程式碼會防止使用者新增或刪除資料錄中的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: To prevent users from adding and deleting records
trans-unit.target: 防止使用者加入及刪除資料錄

trans-unit.source: In the Windows Forms Designer, double-click the form to open the Code Editor.
trans-unit.target: 在 [Windows Form 設計工具] 中，按兩下表單開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the `Form_Load` event:
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼加入 `Form_Load` 事件：

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#3](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_3.cs)] [!code-vb[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#3](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_3.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_3.cs) ] [!code-vb [VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_3.vb)]

trans-unit.source: In the Class Name drop-down list, click **BindingNavigatorDeleteItem**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [類別名稱] 下拉式清單中，按一下 [BindingNavigatorDeleteItem] 。

trans-unit.source: In the Method Name drop-down list, click **EnabledChanged**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [方法名稱] 下拉式清單中，按一下 [EnabledChanged] 。

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the `BindingNavigatorDeleteItem_EnabledChanged` event handler:
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼加入至 `BindingNavigatorDeleteItem_EnabledChanged` 事件處理常式：

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#4](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_4.cs)] [!code-vb[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#4](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_4.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_4.cs) ] [!code-vb [VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_4.vb)]

trans-unit.source: This step is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> will enable the **DeleteItem** button every time that the current record changes.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要步驟因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>可讓**DeleteItem**按鈕每次變更目前的記錄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Press F5 to run the application.
trans-unit.target: 按 F5 執行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the **DeleteItem** button is disabled and that you cannot delete items by pressing the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，[DeleteItem] 按鈕處於停用狀態，而且您無法按 DELETE 鍵刪除項目。

trans-unit.source: Adding Search Capability to the DataRepeater Control
trans-unit.target: 將搜尋功能加入 DataRepeater 控制項中

trans-unit.source: In this optional step, you implement the capability to search for a value in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 在這個選擇性的步驟中，您將實作功能，可搜尋的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: If the search string is found, the control selects the item that contains the value and scrolls the item into view.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到搜尋字串，控制項就會選取含有此值的項目，並捲動以檢視項目。

trans-unit.source: To add search capability
trans-unit.target: 加入搜尋功能

trans-unit.source: Drag a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control from the **Toolbox** onto the form that contains the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 拖放到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項從**工具箱**拖曳至表單，其中包含<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Position it under the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 放置在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, change the **Name** property to **SearchTextBox**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 **Name** 屬性變更為 **SearchTextBox**。

trans-unit.source: Drag a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control from the **Toolbox** onto the form that contains the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 拖放到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項從**工具箱**拖曳至表單，其中包含<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: Position it under the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 放置在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, change the **Name** property to **SearchButton**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 **Name** 屬性變更為 **SearchButton**。

trans-unit.source: Change the **Text** property to **Search**.
trans-unit.target: 將 **Text** 屬性變更為 **Search**。

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control to open the Code Editor, and add the following code to the `SearchButton_Click` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項加入程式碼編輯器中，開啟，並加入下列程式碼以`SearchButton_Click`事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#5](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_5.cs)] [!code-vb[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough#5](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_5.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/CSharp/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_5.cs) ] [!code-vb [VbPowerPacksDataRepeaterWalkthrough](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/windows-forms/codesnippet/VisualBasic/walkthrough-displaying-data-in-a-datarepeater-control-visual-studio_5.vb)]

trans-unit.source: Press F5 to run the application.
trans-unit.target: 按 F5 執行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Type a customer ID in **SearchTextBox** and click the **Search** button.
trans-unit.target: 在 [SearchTextBox] 中輸入客戶 ID，然後按一下 [搜尋] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Adding a Master and Detail Table to the DataRepeater
trans-unit.target: 將主控制項和詳細資料控制項資料表加入 DataRepeater

trans-unit.source: In this optional step, you add a second <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control to display related orders for each customer.
trans-unit.target: 在這個選擇性的步驟中，您將新增第二個<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項來顯示每位客戶的相關的訂單。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: To add a master and detail table
trans-unit.target: 加入主控制項和詳細資料控制項資料表

trans-unit.source: Drag a second <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control from the **Visual Basic PowerPacks** tab in the **Toolbox** onto the form.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳第二個<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項從**Visual Basic PowerPacks**索引標籤中**工具箱**拖曳至表單。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, set the **Location** property to `465, 25`.
trans-unit.target: 在 [屬性] 視窗中，將 **Location** 屬性設定為 `465, 25`。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Size** property to `315, 600`.
trans-unit.target: 將 **Size** 屬性設定為 `315, 600`。

trans-unit.source: In the **Data Sources** window, expand the **Customers** table node and select the detail node for the **Orders** table.
trans-unit.target: 在 [資料來源] 視窗中，展開 [Customers] 資料表節點，並選取 [Orders] 資料表的詳細資料節點。

trans-unit.source: Change the drop type of this **Orders** table to Details by clicking **Details** in the drop-down list on the table node.
trans-unit.target: 在資料表節點上，按一下下拉式清單中的 [詳細資料] ，將此 [Orders] 資料表的卸除類型變更為 [詳細資料]。

trans-unit.source: Drag this **Orders** table node onto the item template region (the upper region) of the second <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳這個**訂單**資料表節點拖曳至第二個項目樣板區域 （上方區域）<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.source: An **OrdersBindingSource** component and an **OrdersTableAdapter** component are added to the Component Tray.
trans-unit.target: **OrdersBindingSource** 元件和 **OrdersTableAdapter** 元件隨即加入 [元件匣]。

trans-unit.source: Press F5 to run the application.
trans-unit.target: 按 F5 執行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: When you select each customer in the first <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control, the orders for that customer are displayed in the second <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 當您選取每個客戶在第一個<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項，訂單 顯示該客戶的第二個<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>控制項。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.DataRepeater>

trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
